metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20234 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description:
An uncontrolled resource consumption (memory leak) flaw was found in theZeroMQ client in versions before 4.3.3 in src/pipe.cpp. This issue causes aclient that connects to multiple malicious or compromised servers to crash.The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20234` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzmq5 - 4.3.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zeromq3 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.4-1').
